::Slayer::

Slayer raises an eyebrow at Ignatius's last statement,unsure what the bot was trying to say.

"What do you mean?" he asks, frowning and looking at the contents of the box.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius scanned the box, it responded by downloading the index of the
> boxxes contents. A mechanical voice relayed the inventory step by step. "It
> seems to be a survival kit." Ignatius says as the contents continued loading
> into his memory. "I don't believe he kept this a secret for this long." he
> pressed a code opening the box, "There's backup disks for everybody that
> landed with Prebon in case anything happened to the team." his eyes lit as
> the name Light raid came across. "My informations included, I was meant to
> be recreated after my memory was transfered out of the base computer." I can
> live again."
